SA20sthtvbhu:5: tathā hy ātmadṛṣṭiprabhavā rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhaś ca satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣatvāt tatprahāṇāya pravartamānaḥ sarvakleśān prajahāti /
SA20sthtvbhu:8: kleśā hi mokṣaprāpter āvaraṇam iti atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu mokṣo 'dhigamyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:9: jñeyāvaraṇam api sarvasmin jñeye jñānapravṛttipratibandhabhūtam akliṣṭam ajñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:10: tasmin prahīṇe sarvākāre jñeye 'saktam apratihatañ ca jñānaṃ pravartata ity ataḥ sarvajñatvam adhigamyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:11: atha vā dharmapudgalābhiniviṣṭāś cittamātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānantīty ato dharmapudgalanairātmyapradarśanena saphale vijñaptimātre 'nupūrveṇa praveśārthaṃ prakaraṇārambhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:12: atha vā vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata eveti kecin manyante /
SA20sthtvbhu:13: vijñeyavad vijñānam api saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata ity asya dviprakārasyāpy ekāntavādasya pratiṣedhārthaḥ prakaraṇārambhaḥ //
SA20sthtvbhu:22: ātmā jīvo jantur manujo māṇava ity evamādika ātmopacāraḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ity evamādiko dharmopacāraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:23: ayaṃ dviprakāro 'py upacāro vijñānapariṇāma eva na mukhye ātmani dharmeṣu ceti /
SA20sthtvbhu:25: dharmāṇām ātmanaś ca vijñānapariṇāmād bahir abhāvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:29: tatrātmādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣād rūpādivikalpavāsanāparipoṣāc cālayavijñānād ātmādinirbhāso vikalpo rūpādinirbhāsaś cotpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:30: [Tvbh_42] tam ātmādinirbhāsaṃ rūpādinirbhāsañ ca tasmād vikalpād bahirbhūtam ivopādāyātmādyupacāro rūpādidharmopacāraś cānādikālikaḥ pravartate vināpi bāhyenātmanā dharmaiś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:32: yac ca yatra nāsti tat tatropacaryate /
SA20sthtvbhu:34: evaṃ vijñānasvarūpe bahiś cātmadharmābhāvāt parikalpita evātmā dharmāś ca na tu paramārthataḥ santīti vijñānavad vijñeyam api dravyata evety ayam ekāntavādo nābhyupeyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:35: upacārasya ca nirādhārasyāsaṃbhavād avaśyaṃ vijñānapariṇāmo vastuto 'stīty upagantavyo yatrātmadharmopacāraḥ pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:36: ataś cāyam abhyupagamo na yuktikṣamo vijñānam api vijñeyavat saṃvṛtita eva na paramārthata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:37: saṃvṛtito 'py abhāvaprasaṅgān na hi saṃvṛtir nirupādānā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:38: tasmād ayam ekāntavādo dviprakāro 'pi niryuktikatvāt tyājya ity ācāryavacanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:39: evañ ca sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvatvād vastuto na vidyate vijñānaṃ punaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvād dravyato 'stīty abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:41: katham etad gamyate vinā bāhyenārthena vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:42: bāhyo hy arthaḥ svābhāsavijñānajanakatvena vijñānasyālambanapratyaya iṣyate na kāraṇatvamātreṇa samanantarādipratyayād viśeṣāprasaṅgāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:45: na ca sañcitam avayavasaṃhatimātrād anyad vidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:47: tasmād vinaiva bāhyenārthena vijñānaṃ sañcitākāram utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:48: na ca paramāṇava eva saṃcitās tasyālambanaṃ paramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:49: na hy asañcitāvasthātaḥ sañcitāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kaścid ātmātiśayaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:50: tasmād asañcitavat sañcitā api paramāṇavo naivālambanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:52: ekaika paramāṇur anyanirapekṣyo 'tīndriyo bahavas tu parasparāpekṣā indriyagrāhyāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:53: teṣām api sāpekṣanirapekṣāvasthayor ātmātiśayābhāvād ekāntenendriyagrāhyatvam atīndriyatvaṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:54: yadi ca paramāṇava eva parasparāpekṣā vijñānasya viṣayībhavanti /
SA20sthtvbhu:55: evaṃ sati yo 'yaṃ ghaṭakuḍyādyākārabhedo vijñāne sa na syāt praramāṇūnām atadākāratvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:57: na ca paramāṇavaḥ stambhādivat paramārthataḥ santy/
SA20sthtvbhu:59: tadanabhyupagame vā pūrvadakṣiṇāparottarādidigbhedo yaḥ sa paramāṇor na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:60: tataś ca vijñānavat paramāṇor apy amūrtatvam adeśasthatvañ ca prasajyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:61: evaṃ bāhyārthābhāvād vijñānam evārthākāram utpadyate svapnavijñānavad ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:63: na ca vartamānā vartamānajanakā utpadyamānāvasthāyām asattvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:64: [Tvbh_46] utpannāvasthāyāṃ vijñānasyāpi tadākāreṇotpannatvān na kiñcit kartavyam astīti manovijñānam apy anālambanam evotpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:66: asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:67: upacāro hi triṣu satsu bhavati nānyatamābhāve mukhyapadārthe tatsadṛśe 'nyasmin viṣaye tayoś ca sādṛśye /
SA20sthtvbhu:68: tad yathā mukhye 'gnau tatsadṛśe ca māṇavake tayoś ca sādhāraṇe dharme kapilatve tīkṣṇatve vā saty agnir māṇavaka ity upacāraḥ kriyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:69: atra hy agnir māṇavaka iti jātir dravyaṃ vopacaryate /
SA20sthtvbhu:71: tatra tāvan na jāteḥ sādhāraṇaṃ kapilatvaṃ tīkṣṇatvaṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:72: na ca sādhāraṇadharmābhāve māṇavake jāter upacāro yujyate 'tiprasaṅgāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:75: jātyabhāve 'pi tīkṣṇatvakapilatvayor māṇavake darśanād avinābhāvitvam ayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:79: na hi yo 'gnes tīkṣṇo guṇaḥ kapilo vā sa eva māṇavake /
SA20sthtvbhu:81: viśeṣasya svāśrayapratibaddhatvān na vināgniguṇenāgner māṇavake upacāro yuktaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:83: evam apy agniguṇasyaiva tīkṣṇasya kapilasya vā māṇavakaguṇe tīkṣṇe kapile vā sādṛśyād upacāro yukto na tu māṇavake 'gner guṇasādṛśyenāsaṃbandhāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:87: pradhāne hi guṇarūpeṇaiva jñānābhidhāne pravartete tatsvarūpāsaṃsparśāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:89: na hi jñānābhidhānavyatirikto 'nyaḥ padārthasvarūpaparicchittyupāyo 'stīty ataḥ pradhānasvarūpaviṣayajñānābhidhānābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'stīty avagantavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:90: evaṃ yāvac chabde saṃbandhābhāvāj jñānābhidhānābhāva evañ cābhidhānābhidheyābhāvān naiva mukhyaḥ padārtho 'sti /
SA20sthtvbhu:91: api ca sarva evāyaṃ gauṇa eva na mukhyo 'sti /
SA20sthtvbhu:92: gauṇo hi nāma yo yatrāvidyamānena rūpeṇa pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:93: sarvaś ca śabdaḥ pradhāne 'vidyamānenaiva guṇarūpeṇa pravartate ato mukhyo nāsty eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:94: tatra yad uktaṃ asaty ātmani mukhye dharmeṣu copacāro na yukta iti tad ayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:95: vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kati prabheda iti na jñāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:98: yatrātmādyupacāro dharmopacāraś ca sa punar hetubhāvena phalabhāvena ca bhidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:100: phalapariṇāmaḥ punar vipākavāsanāvṛttilābhād ālayavijñānasya pūrvakarmākṣepaparisamāptau yā nikāyasabhāgāntareṣv abhinirvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:101: niṣyandavāsanāvṛttilābhāc ca yā pravṛttivijñānānāṃ kliṣṭasya ca manasa ālayavijñānād abhinirvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:102: tatra pravṛttivijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalam ālayavijñāne vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāñ cādhatte /
SA20sthtvbhu:103: avyākṛtaṃ kliṣṭañ ca mano niṣyandavāsanām eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:105: yo 'sau trividhaḥ pariṇāma ukto 'sāv api na jñāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:107: vipāko mananākhyaś ca vijñaptir viṣayasya ca / 2ab
SA20sthtvbhu:108: iti / sa eṣa trividhaḥ pariṇāmo vipākākhyo mananākhyo viṣayavijñaptyākhyaś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:112: tatsvarūpanirdeśam antareṇa na tat pratīyate ity ato yasya yat svarūpaṃ tad yathākramaṃ pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:114: iti / tatreti yo 'yam anantaroktas trividhaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:115: ālayākhyam ity ālayavijñānasaṃjñakaṃ yad vijñānaṃ sa vipākapariṇāmaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:118: atha vālīyante upanibadhyante 'smin sarvadharmāḥ kāryabhāvena tad vālīyate upanibadhyate kāraṇabhāvena sarvadharmeṣv ity ālayaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:122: yadi pravṛttivijñānavyatiriktam ālayavijñānam asti tato 'syālambanam ākāro vā vaktavyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:123: na hi nirālambanaṃ nirākāraṃ vā vijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:129: tatrādhyātmam upādānaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:132: asaṃviditaka upādir yasmin asaṃviditakā ca sthānavijñaptir yasmin tad ālayavijñānam asaṃviditakopādisthānavijñaptikam /
SA20sthtvbhu:135: tatsadbhāvād ālayavijñānenātmādivikalpo rūpādivikalpaś ca kāryatvenopātta iti tad vāsanātmādivikalpānāṃ rūpādivikalpānāñ copādir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:136: so 'sminn idaṃ tad iti pratisaṃvedanākāreṇāsaṃvidita ity atas tad asaṃviditakopādir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:138: āśraya ātmabhāvaḥ sādhiṣṭhānam indriyarūpaṃ nāma ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:139: tasya punar yad upādānam upagamanam ekayogakṣematvena tad upādiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:141: ārūpyadhātau tu rūpavītarāgatvād rūpavipākānabhinirvṛtter nāmopādānam eva /
SA20sthtvbhu:142: kin tu vāsanāvastham eva tatra rūpaṃ na vipākāvastham /
SA20sthtvbhu:143: tat punar upādānam idantayā pratisaṃvedayitum aśakyam ity ato 'saṃvidita ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:149: na ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu vijñānaṃ naivāstīti śakyate pratipattum /
SA20sthtvbhu:152: ity uktaṃ vijñānañ cāvaśyaṃ caittaiḥ saṃprayuktam ity ato vaktavyaṃ katamaiḥ katibhiś ca tebhyaḥ saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:156: iti / sadeti yāvad ālayavijñānaṃ tāvad ebhiḥ sparśamanaskāravedanāsaṃjñācetanākhyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sarvatragair dharmair anvitam / vedanā vit /
SA20sthtvbhu:161: tasmin sati tatsamakālam evendriyasya sukhādivedanānukūlo yo vikāras tena [Tvbh_56] sadṛśo viṣayasya sukhādivedanīyākāraparicchedo yaḥ sa sparśaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:162: indriyaṃ punar yena viśeṣeṇa sukhaduḥkhādihetutvaṃ pratipadyate sa tasya vikāraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:163: sparśaḥ punar indriyavikārasādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśa ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:166: evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ veditam iti vistaraḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:171: cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaś cittasyāvarjanam /
SA20sthtvbhu:172: etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktaṃ na tu yaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tasya hi pratikṣaṇam eva vyāpāro na kṣaṇāntare /
SA20sthtvbhu:179: śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhavanty anenety anubhavaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:186: tatra sukho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punaḥ saṃyogecchā jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:187: duḥkho 'nubhavo yasminn utpanne viyogecchā niruddhe ca punar asaṃyogecchā /
SA20sthtvbhu:188: aduḥkhāsukho yasminn utpanne niruddhe cobhyaṃ na jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:192: tasyodgrahaṇaṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nīlam etan na pītam iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:194: cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manasaś ceṣṭā yasyāṃ satyām ālambanaṃ prati cetasaḥ praspanda iva bhavaty ayaskāntavaśād ayaḥpraspandavat /
SA20sthtvbhu:195: vedanā trividhā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:196: dharmāś catuḥ prakārāḥ kuśalā akuśalā anivṛtāvyākṛtā nivṛtāvyākṛtāś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:197: tatrālayavijñāne vid iti sāmānyopadeśena na vijñāyate tisṝṇāṃ vedanānāṃ katamā vedanā /
SA20sthtvbhu:198: tathā tad api kiṃ kuśalam akuśalam anivṛtāvyākṛtaṃ nivṛtāvyākṛtam iti na vijñāyata ity ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:201: upekṣaivālayavijñāne vedanā na sukhā na duḥkhā tayoḥ paricchinnālambanākāratvād rāgadveṣānuśayitatvāc ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:210_0: yathālayavijñānam ekāntena vipāko 'paricchinnālambanākāraṃ sadā sparśādibhir anvitaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:210_1: tatra copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtañ ca tathā sparśādayo 'py ekāntena vipākā evāparicchinnālambanākārāś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:211: ātmānaṃ hitvetaraiś caturbhir ālayavijñānena ca nityam anugatās teṣu copekṣaiva vedanānivṛtāvyākṛtāś cālayavijñānavat /
SA20sthtvbhu:212: na hi vipākena saṃprayuktānām avipākatvam aparicchinnālambanākāreṇa ca paricchinnālambanākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:214: kiṃ punas tad ālayavijñānam ekam abhinnam āsaṃsāram anuvartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:216: na hi tad ekam abhinnam anuvartate kṣaṇikatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:221: udakasamūhasya pūrvāparabhāgāvicchedena pravāha ogha ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:222_0: yathā hy oghas tṛṇakāṣṭhagomayādīn ākarṣayaṅ gacchaty evam ālayavijñānam api puṇyāpuṇyāneñjyakarmavāsanānugataṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:222_1: sparśamanaskārādīn ākarṣan srotasāsaṃsāram avyuparataṃ pravartata iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:223: tasyaivaṃ śrotasā pravṛttasya kasyām avasthāyāṃ vyāvṛttir ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:227: kasya punar yogād arhann ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:229: tasyāṃ hy avasthāyām ālayavijñānāśritadauṣṭhulyaniravaśeṣaprahāṇād ālayavijñānaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:235: tatra yathā cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ cakṣurādaya āśrayatvena rūpādayaś cālambanatvena prasiddhā naiva kliṣṭasya manasa āśraya ālambanaṃ vā prasiddham /
SA20sthtvbhu:236: na ca vijñānam āśrayālambananirapekṣaṃ yujyata ity ataḥ kliṣṭasya manasa āśrayālambanapratipādanārthaṃ niruktipratipādanārthañ cāha /
SA20sthtvbhu:239: tad āśritya pravartata iti tacchabdenālayavijñānam abhisaṃbadhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:240: tadvāsanāśrayo hy ālayavijñānam atas tad āśritya pravartate santānenotpadyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:241: atha vā yasmin dhātau bhūmau vālayavijñānaṃ vipākas tad api kliṣṭaṃ manas taddhātukaṃ tadbhūmikaṃ ceti tatpratibaddhavṛttitvāt tad āśritya pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:242: tadālambam ity ālayavijñānālambanam eva satkāyadṛṣṭyādibhiḥ saṃprayogād ahaṃ mamety ālayavijñānālambanatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:243: kathaṃ punar yata eva cittād utpadyate tad eva tadālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:244: yathā tad anicchatāṃ keṣāṃcit kasyāñcid avasthāyāṃ yata eva cittān manovijñānam utpadyate tadālambanam eva tad utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:245: manonāma vijñānam iti mana iti nāma ākhyā yasya vijñānasya tad ālayavijñānam āśritya pravarte tadālambanaṃ ca manonāmety anenālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānāc ca vyavacchinatti /
SA20sthtvbhu:246: tat punaḥ kiṃ svabhāvam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:248: evaṃ mananātmakatvān mana ity ucyate nairūktena vidhinā /
SA20sthtvbhu:251: idaṃ tu na jñāyate katamais tac caittaiḥ kiyadbhiḥ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ vā saṃprayujyata ity ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:253: caittā hi dviprakārāḥ kleśās tad anye ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:256: na ca taiḥ saṃprayujyate 'taś caturbhir ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:261: na hi nivṛtena vijñānenākuśalānāṃ saṃprayogaḥ saṃbhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:265: yāvat tad asti tāvat taiḥ saṃprayuktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:266: sāmānyanirdeśād viśeṣato na jñāyanta iti viśeṣato nirdiśati /
SA20sthtvbhu:268: upādānaskandheṣv ātmeti darśanam ātmadṛṣṭiḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:273: tatrālayavijñānasvarūpe saṃmūḍhaḥ sann ālayavijñāne ātmadṛṣṭim utpādayati /
SA20sthtvbhu:275: etasmiṃs traye saty ātmābhimate vastuni yo 'bhiṣvaṅgaḥ sa ātmasnehaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:280: viparyāsanimittaṃ tu manaḥ kliṣṭaṃ sadaiva tat /
SA20sthtvbhu:282: ete hy ātmamohādayaḥ kleśā manovan navabhūmikāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:283: iha ca sāmānyenābhidhānān na jñāyate kiṃ svabhūmikair eva saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:287: tanmayair iti yatra dhātau bhūmau vā jātas taddhātukais tadbhūmikair eva ca saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:289: kiṃ punaś caturbhir eva kleśaiḥ saṃprayujyate / nety āha /

SA20sthtvbhu:668: kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ sarvatragaiḥ pañcabhiś caturbhiś ca kleśair ātmamohādibhiḥ sadā saṃprayujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:672: kiṃ pañcānāñ cakṣurvijñānādīnāṃ yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhye 'py ālayavijñānād ekasyaivotpattir bhavati na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:674: na dvayor na bahūnāṃ vā yugapat samanantarapratyayābhāvād ekasyaiva vijñānasyotpattir bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:675: na caikaṃ vijñānaṃ bahūnāṃ samantarapratyayatvaṃ pratipattum utsahate /
SA20sthtvbhu:678: evaṃ dvayor bahūnāñ ca pratyayasāṃnidhye utpattir bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:680: vijñānānāṃ saha na vā taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jale // 15
SA20sthtvbhu:682: pañcānāṃ cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ bījāśrayatvāt tadutpatter gatiṣu janmopādānāc cālayavijñānaṃ mūlavijñānam ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:683: yathāpratyayam udbhava iti yasya yasya yaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃnihitas tasya tasya niyamenodbhava ātmalābhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:684: saha na veti yugapat krameṇa vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:685: taraṅgāṇāṃ yathā jala ity ālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānānāṃ yugapad ayugapac cotpattau dṛṣṭāntaḥ / yathoktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:686: tadyathā viśālamate mahata udakaughasya vahataḥ saced ekasya
SA20sthtvbhu:695: evam eva viśālamate tadoghasthānīyam ālayavijñānaṃ saṃniśritya
SA20sthtvbhu:697: pratyupasthito bhavaty ekam eva cakṣurvijñānaṃ pravartate /
SA20sthtvbhu:698: saced dvayos trayāṇāṃ sacet pañcānāṃ vijñānānām utpattipratyayaḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:699: pratyupasthito bhavati sakṛd yāvat pañcānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:702: ādānavijñāna gabhīrasūkṣmo ogho yathā vartati sarvabījo /
SA20sthtvbhu:703: bālāna eṣo mayi na prakāśi mā haiva ātmā parikalpayeyur
SA20sthtvbhu:704: iti / na hi vijñānapratiniyamenālambanapratyayavat samanantarapratyaya iṣyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:706: ata ekasmād api samanantarapratyayād ālambanapratyayasānnidhye dvayor bahūnāṃ vā vijñānānām utpattir na virūdhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:708: pañcānāñ ca yugapad ālambanapratyayasānnidhya ekenaivotpattavyaṃ na pañcabhir apīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:709: tasmād alambanasadbhāve pañcānām api cotpattir ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:711: kiṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha pravartate vinā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:715: iti / sarvadeti sarvakālaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaiḥ saha vinā cety arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:718: samāpattidvayān middhān mūrcchanād apy acittakād iti / (16bd)
SA20sthtvbhu:719: tatrāsaṃjñikam asaṃjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannasya yaś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:723: tṛtīyād dhyānād vītarāgasyordhvam avītarāgasya niḥsaraṇasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa manovijñānasya tatsaṃprayuktānāñ ca caittānāṃ yo nirodhaḥ so 'trāsaṃjñisamāpattir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:727: sa ca samāpatticittād anantarañ cittāntarotpattiviruddha āśrayaḥ prāpyata iti samāpattir ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:728: nirodhasamāpattir ākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śāntavihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇa sasaṃprayogasya manovijñānasya kliṣṭasya ca manaso yo nirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:730: acittakaṃ middhaṃ gāḍhamiddhopahatatvād āśrayasya tāvatkālaṃ manovijñānāpravṛtter acittakam ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:734: etāḥ pañcāvasthā varjayitvā tadanyāsu sarvāsv avasthāsu manovijñānapravṛttir veditavyā /
SA20sthtvbhu:735: evam āsaṃjñikādiṣu manovijñāne niruddhe tadapagame punaḥ kuta utpadyate yatas tasya kālakriyā na bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:738: yatra vijñānapariṇāme ātmadharmopacāraḥ sa punas tridhety uddiśya vistareṇa trividho 'pi nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:740: idānīm ātmadharmopacāro yaḥ pravartate sa vijñānapariṇāma eva na vijñānapariṇāmāc ca pṛthag asty ātmā dharmā ceti yat pratijñātaṃ tatprasādhanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:742: tena tan nāsti tenedaṃ sarvaṃ vijñāptimātrakam // 17
SA20sthtvbhu:743: iti / yo 'yaṃ vijñānapariṇāmas trividho 'nantaram abhihitaḥ so 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:744: adhyāropitārthākārās traidhātukāś cittacaittā vikalpa ucyate / yathoktam /
SA20sthtvbhu:746: tena trividhena vikalpenālayavijñānakliṣṭamanaḥpravṛttivijñānasvabhāvena sasaṃprayogeṇa yad vikalpyate bhājanam ātmāskandhadhātvāyatanarūpaśabdādikaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:747: vastu tan nāstīty ataḥ sa vijñānapariṇāmo vikalpa ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:749: kathaṃ punar etad vijñāyate tadālambanam asad iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:750: yad dhi yasya kāraṇaṃ tasmin samagre cāviruddhe ca tad utpadyate nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:751: vijñānañ ca māyāgandharvanagarasvapnatimirādāv asaty apyālambane jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:752: yadi ca vijñānasyālambanapratibaddha utpādaḥ syād evaṃ sati māyādiṣv arthābhāvān na vijñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:754: tasmāt pūrvakān niruddhāt tajjātīyavijñānād vijñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:755: na bāhyād arthāt tasminn asaty api bhāvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:756: dṛṣṭā cābhinne 'py arthe pratipattṝṇāṃ parasparaviruddhā pratipattiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:758: tasmād adhyāropitarūpatvād vikalpasyālambanam asad iti pratipattavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:762: yasmāt pariṇāmātmakena vikalpena yad vikalpyate tena tan nāsti tasmād viṣayābhāvāt sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam /
SA20sthtvbhu:766: yadi sarvaṃ vijñaptimātrakam eva na tato 'nyaḥ kartā karaṇaṃ vāsti kathaṃ mūlavijñānād anadhiṣṭhitād asati karaṇe vikalpāḥ pravartanta ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:767: sarvabījaṃ hi vijñānaṃ pariṇāmas tathā tathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:768: yāty anyonyavaśād yena vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate // 18
SA20sthtvbhu:769: tatra sarvadharmotpādanaśaktyanugamāt sarvabījaṃ vijñānam ity ālayavijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:770: vijñānaṃ hy asarvabījam apy astīty ataḥ sarvabījam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:771: vijñānād anyad api kaiścit pradhānādi sarvabījaṃ kalpyata iti vijñānam ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:774: pariṇāmas tathā tathā yāty anyonyavaśād iti / (18bc)
SA20sthtvbhu:776: tathā tatheti tasya tasya vikalpasyānantarotpādanasamarthāvasthāṃ prāpnotīty arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:779: tathā hi cakṣurādivijñānaṃ svaśaktiparipoṣe vartamāne śaktiviśiṣṭasyālayavijñānapariṇāmasya nimittaṃ so 'pi ālayavijñānapariṇāmaś cakṣurādivijñānasya nimittaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:780: evam anyonyavaśād yasmād ubhayaṃ pravartate tasmād ālayavijñānād anyenānadhiṣṭhitād anekaprakāro vikalpaḥ sa sa jāyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:781: tatra ca vartamāne janmani yathālayavijñānāt pravṛttivijñānasyotpattir bhavati tathākhyātam /
SA20sthtvbhu:782: idānīṃ vijñaptimātre anāgataṃ janma vartamānajanmanirodhe sati yathā pratisaṃdhīyate tat pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:786: tena karmaṇā yad anāgatātmabhāvābhinirvṛttaye ālayavijñāne sāmarthyam āhitaṃ sā karmavāsanā /
SA20sthtvbhu:788: tatra vijñānāt pṛthag eva svasantānādhyāsitaṃ grāhyam astīty adhyavasāyo grāhyagrāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:789: tac ca vijñānena pratīyate vijñāyate gṛhyata iti yo 'yaṃ niścayaḥ sa grahakagrāhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:793: grāhadvayavāsanā tu sarvakarmavāsanānāṃ yathāsvam ākṣiptātmabhāvotpādane pravṛttānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:795: evañ ca na kevalāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanānanugṛhītā vipākañ janayantīty uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:798: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāke 'nyaṃ vipākaṃ janayanti tad iti / (19cd)
SA20sthtvbhu:799_0: pūrvajanmopacitena karmaṇā ya iti vipāko 'bhinirvṛttas tasmin kṣīṇa ity ākṣepakāle
SA20sthtvbhu:799_1: paryantāvasthite yathābalaṃ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitā upabhūktād vipākād
SA20sthtvbhu:801: kṣīṇe pūrvavipāka ity anena śāśvatāntaṃ pariharati /
SA20sthtvbhu:804: tad eva ca sarvabījakaṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam iti kuta etat /
SA20sthtvbhu:809: tasmin sati gatiḥ sarvā nirvāṇādhigamo 'pi ca //
SA20sthtvbhu:810: na cālayavijñānam antareṇa saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttir vā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:813: tatrālayavijñānād anyat saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:815: saṃsārasyālayavijñānānabhyupagame pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:816_0: tatra ye saṃskārāḥ prātisaṃdhikavijñānapratyayatveneṣyante teṣāñ ciraniruddhatvān
SA20sthtvbhu:816_1: niruddhasya cāsatvād asataś ca pratyayatvābhāvān na saṃskārapratyayaṃ pratisandhivijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:817: pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam apy asti na kevalaṃ vijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:818: tatra vijñānam eva saṃskārapratyayaṃ na nāmarūpam iti kā tatra yuktiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:822: yad uttarakālam iti cet tasya prātisandhikanāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam /
SA20sthtvbhu:824: ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu kiṃ pratisandhivijñānenāṅgāntareṇa parikalpitena /
SA20sthtvbhu:827: saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyā api na saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:829: na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vā svātmany ādhātuṃ samarthaṃ svātmani kāritravirodhāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:833: acittikāsu ca nirodhasamāpattyādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasaṃbhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:835: evaṃ yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:836: tataś ca saṃsārapravṛttir eva na syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:837: tasmād avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārās tadadhivāsitañ cālayavijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:838: tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau nāmarūpam ity eṣaiva nītir anavadyā /
SA20sthtvbhu:839: saṃsāranivṛttir api ālayavijñāne asati na yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:840: saṃsārasya hi karmakleśāś ca kāraṇaṃ tayoś ca kleśāḥ pradhānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:841: tathā hi kleśādhipatyāt karma punarbhavākṣepasamarthaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:842: tathākṣiptapunarbhavo 'pi karma kleśādhipatyād eva punarbhavo bhavati nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:843: evañ ca kleśā eva saṃsārapravṛtteḥ pradhānatvān mūlam /
SA20sthtvbhu:844: atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu saṃsāro vinivartate nānyathā /
SA20sthtvbhu:848: saṃmukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyate bījāvastho vā /
SA20sthtvbhu:849: tatra saṃmukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:851: na hi pratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate yatra kleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta /
SA20sthtvbhu:853: na hi tat kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo bhavitum arhati /
SA20sthtvbhu:855: tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūbhiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyate svabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity abhyupeyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:856_0: ye punaś cittata eva saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃ vāsanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:856_1: pravartante teṣāñ cālayavijñānavyavasthitaṃ bījaṃ tatsahabhuvā kleśapratipakṣamārgeṇāpanīyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:857: tasmiṃś cāpanīte na punas tenāśrayeṇa kleśānām utpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ prāpyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:859: na hi karma vidyamānam api kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu sahakārikāraṇabhāvāt punarbhavam abhinirvartayituṃ samartham /
SA20sthtvbhu:860_0: evam ālayavijñāne sati saṃsārapravṛttir nivṛttiś ca nānyathety avaśyaṃ cakṣurādivijñānavyatiriktam
SA20sthtvbhu:860_1: ālayavijñānaṃ tad eva ca sarvadharmabījānugataṃ na cakṣurādivijñānam ity abhyupagantavyam /
SA20sthtvbhu:863: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kathaṃ na sūtravirodhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:864: sūtreṣu hi trayaḥ svabhāvā uktāḥ parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:869: yena yena vikalpena yad yad vastu vikalpyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:870: parikalpita evāsau svabhāvo na sa vidyate // 20
SA20sthtvbhu:874: ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vāntaśo yāvad buddhadharmā api /
SA20sthtvbhu:878: yad vastu vikalpyaviṣayas tad yasmāt sattābhāvān na vidyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:881: tathā hy ekasmin vastuni tadabhāve ca parasparaviruddhānekavikalpapravṛttir dṛṣṭā /
SA20sthtvbhu:882: na ca tad ekaṃ vastu tadabhāvo vā parasparaviruddhānekasvabhāvo yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:883: tasmāt sarvam idaṃ vikalpamātram eva tadarthasya parikalpitarūpatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:885: na khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmās tathā vidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭā iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:886: parikalpitānantaraṃ paratantrasvabhāvo vaktavya iti / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:888: atra ca vikalpa iti paratantrasvarūpam āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:895: parair hetupratyayais tantryata iti paratantra utpādyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:899: niṣpannas tasya pūrveṇa sadā rahitatā tu yā // 21cd
SA20sthtvbhu:901: tasyeti paratantrasya pūrveṇeti parikalpitena tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:902: tathā hi tasmin vikalpe grāhyagrāhakatvam avidyamānam eva parikalpyata iti parikalpitam ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:903: tena grāhyagrāhakeṇa paratantrasya sadā sarvakālam atyantarahitatā yā sa pariniṣpannasvabhāvaḥ //
SA20sthtvbhu:904: ata eva sa naivānyo nānanyaḥ paratantrataḥ / 22ab
SA20sthtvbhu:905: ata eva sa naiveti parikalpitena svabhāvena paratantrasya sadā rahitatā pariniṣpannaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:907: sā ca dharmatā dharmān nānyā nānanyā yujyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:908: pariniṣpannaś ca paratantradharmatety ataḥ paratantrāt pariniṣpanno nānyo nānanya iti boddhavyaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:909: yadi hi pariniṣpannaḥ paratantrād anyaḥ syād evaṃ na parikalpitena paratantraḥ śūnyaḥ syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:910: athānanya evam api pariniṣpanno na viśuddhālambanaḥ syāt paratantravat saṃkleśātmakatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:911: evaṃ paratantraś ca na kleśātmakaḥ syāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:921: athānanyā evam api saṃskārāḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvarūpāḥ syur anityatāvat /
SA20sthtvbhu:923: yadi grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahitaḥ paratantraḥ katham asau gṛhyate agṛhyamāṇo vā katham astīti vijñāyate / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:925: nādṛṣṭe 'sminn iti pariniṣpannasvabhāve sa dṛśyata iti paratantraḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:926: nirvikalpalokottarajñānadṛśye pariniṣpanne svabhāve adṛṣṭe apratividdhe asākṣātkṛte tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānagamyatvāt paratantro 'nyena jñānena na gṛhyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:928: na punar lokottarajñānapṛṣṭhalabdhenāpi jñānena na dṛśyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:934: nirvikalpena jñānenākāśasamatayā tān sarvadharmān paśyatīti paratantradharmāṇāṃ tathatāmātradarśanāt //
SA20sthtvbhu:936: yadi dravyam eva paratantraḥ kathaṃ sūtre sarvadharmā niḥsvabhāvā anutpannā aniruddhā iti nirdiśyante /
SA20sthtvbhu:940: traya eva svabhāvā na caturtho 'stīti jñāpanārthaṃ saṃkhyānirdeśaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:941: svena svena lakṣaṇena vidyamānavad bhavatīti svbhāvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:942: trividhā niḥsvabhāvatā lakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatā utpattiniḥsvabhāvatā paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatā ca /
SA20sthtvbhu:944: idānīṃ trividhasya svabhāvasya yā yasya niḥsvabhāvatā tāṃ tasya pradarśayann āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:947: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathatāpi saḥ / 25ab
SA20sthtvbhu:948: prathamaḥ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo 'yaṃ ca lakṣaṇenaiva niḥsvabhāvas tallakṣaṇasyotprekṣitatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:951: ataś ca svarūpābhāvāt khapuṣpavat svarūpeṇaiva niḥsvabhāvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:955: ataś ca yathā prakhyāti tathāsyotpattir nāstīty ato 'syotpattiniḥsvabhāvatety ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:956: dharmāṇāṃ paramārthaś ca sa yatas tathāpi sa iti / (25ab)
SA20sthtvbhu:957: paramaṃ hi lokottarajñānaṃ niruttaratvāt tasyārthaḥ paramārthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:958: atha vākāśavat sarvatraikarasārthena vaimalyāvikārārthena ca pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ paramārtha ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:959: sa yasmāt pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ paratantrātmakānāṃ paramārthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:960: taddharmateti kṛtvā tasmāt pariniṣpanna eva svabhāvaḥ paramārthaniḥsvabhāvātā pariniṣpannasyābhāvasvabhāvatvāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:965: kiṃ tarhi yāvanto dharmadhātuparyāyāḥ sarvais tair apy abhidhātavya iti //
SA20sthtvbhu:967: tathatā / tathā hi pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu sarvakālaṃ tathaiva bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:969: kiṃ punas tathatāvat pariniṣpanna eva vijñaptimātratā /
SA20sthtvbhu:974: nāmni tiṣṭhati tac cittaṃ tadā tanmātradarśanāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:975: nāmni sthānāc ca vijñaptāv upalambhaḥ prahīyate //
SA20sthtvbhu:978: iti / saiva vijñaptimātratety anena vacanenābhisamaya uktaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:979: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ kasmāc cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanasparśanaiḥ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśān gṛhṇātīty asya bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:982: atha vā yās tāḥ karmavāsanā grāhadvayavāsanāsahitāḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:984: uktaṃ tasmāt kathaṃ prahāṇam aprahāṇaṃ cety ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:988: yāvac cittadharmatāyāṃ vijñaptimātrasaṃśabditāyāṃ vijñānaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate kiṃ tarhi grāhyagrāhakopalambhe carati /
SA20sthtvbhu:991: yāvad advayalakṣaṇe vijñaptimātratve yoginaś cittaṃ na pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati tāvad grāhyagrāhakānuśayo na vinivartate na prahīyata ity arthaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:993: ato 'syaivam bhavaty ahaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ rūpādīn gṛhṇāmīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:994: idam idānīṃ vaktavyaṃ kim artharahitacittamātropalambhāc cittadharmatāvasthānam /
SA20sthtvbhu:996: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhataḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:998: iti atha vā yaḥ punar ābhimānikaḥ śrutamātrakeṇa jānīyad ahaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ śuddhāyāṃ sthita iti tadgrahavyudāsārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:999: vijñaptimātram evedam ity api hy upalambhata ity (27ab)
SA20sthtvbhu:1000_0: ādi / vijñaptimātram evedaṃ artharahitaṃ na bāhyo 'rtho 'stīty evam upalambhato grahaṇataḥ
SA20sthtvbhu:1000_1: citrīkaraṇata ity artho 'grata ity abhimukhaṃ [Tvbh_136] sthāpayann iti yathāśrutaṃ manasā
SA20sthtvbhu:1001: bahuprakāratvād yogācārālambanānāṃ kiṃcid ity āhāsthisaṃkalikaṃ vā vinīlakaṃ vā vipūyakaṃ vā vipaḍumakaṃ vā vyādhmātakādikaṃ vā tanmātre nāvatiṣṭhate vijñānopalambhāprahāṇāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:1002: kadā punar vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ cittadharmātāyāñ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavatīty ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1003: yadā tv ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ naivopalabhate tadā /
SA20sthtvbhu:1005_0: yasmin kāle deśanālambanaṃ avavādālambanaṃ prākṛtaṃ vā rūpaśabdādyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ
SA20sthtvbhu:1005_1: bahiś cittān nopalabhate na paśyati na gṛhṇāti nābhiniviśate yathābhūtārthadarśanān
SA20sthtvbhu:1005_2: na tu jātyandhavat tasmin kāle vijñānagrāhasya prahāṇaṃ svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:1008: grāhye sati grāhako bhavati na tu grāhyābhāva iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:1011: evaṃ hi [Tvbh_138] samasamālambyālambakaṃ nirvikalpaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānam utpadyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:1012: grāhyagrāhakābhiniveśānuśayāḥ prahīyante svacittadharmatāyāṃ ca cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati /
SA20sthtvbhu:1013: yadaivaṃ vijñaptimātratāyāṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhavati tadā kathaṃ vyapadiśyata ity āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1016: sa evānāsravo dhātur acintyaḥ kuśalo dhruvaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1018: iti / tad anena ślokadvayena darśanamārgam ārabhyottaraviśeṣagatyā phalasaṃpattir udbhāvitā vijñaptimātratāpraviṣṭayoginaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1022: anucitatvāl loke samudācārābhāvān nirvikalpatvāc ca lokād uttīrṇam iti
SA20sthtvbhu:1024: tasya jñānasyānantaraṃ āśrayasya parāvṛttir bhavatīti jñāpanārtham āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1027: tasya parāvṛttir yā dauṣṭhulyavipākadvayavāsanābhāvena nivṛttau satyāṃ karmaṇyatādharmakāyādvayajñānabhāvena parāvṛttiḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1028: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ kasya prahāṇāt prāpyate / ata āha /
SA20sthtvbhu:1033: sā punar āśrayaparāvṛttiḥ śrāvakādigatadauṣṭhulyahānitaś ca prāpyate yad āha vimuktikāya iti /
SA20sthtvbhu:1036: dvidhā āvaraṇabhedena sottarā niruttarā cāśrayaparāvṛttir uktā /
SA20sthtvbhu:1039: sarvabījaṃ kleśabījaṃ bandhas tatra dvayor dvayoḥ //
SA20sthtvbhu:1041: ādyasya kleśabījaṃ itarasya dvayāvaraṇabījaṃ tadudghātāt sarvajñatāvāptir bhavatīti /
SA20sthtvbhu:1052: sukho nityatvād eva yad anityaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ ca nitya iti tasmāt sukhaḥ /
SA20sthtvbhu:1054: sa evāśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇo dharmākhyo 'py ucyate mahāmuner bhūmipāramitābhāvanayā kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇāt /
SA20sthtvbhu:1056: saṃsārāparityāgāt tadanupasaṃkleśatvād bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavibhutvalābhataś ca dharmakāya ity ucyate /
SA20sthtvbhu:1057: mahāmuner iti paramauneyayogād buddho bhagavān mahāmunir iti //
